myEx.name: Ethel
myEx.flaws: Always needing help up the stairs, Her teeth keep falling out at the worst times, NO SEX DRIVE!!!, Passes gas in her sleep, Social Security is running out

myEx.name: Gertrude
myEx.flaws: Ever since she broke her hip her mind hasn't been the same and she forgets me form time to time. I was bathing her and all of sudden she flipped out screaming RAPE!!!

myEx.name: Margaret
myEx.flaws: The home she is staying in limited the visiting hours on us after they caught us. So I just cut my losses.

myEx.name: Ida
myEx.flaws: As soon as I came to really care about Ida, I realized that as everyday that goes by she looks more and more like a spud. So I started to call her Ida-ho (in reference to one of the state's cash crop) and she didn't like that so I dumped her for her lack of a sense of humor.

myEx.name: Bertha
myEx.flaws: Bertha passed away at a ripe ole age of 97. Our love was something that dreams were made of and I miss her. I miss her so much that I still see her out and about.
